verdict: Single campaign structure limits growth; $111 CPA acceptable for tours but needs expansion and diversification

checks.name: Conversion actions defined
checks.finding: 31 conversions tracked but specific actions not verified — needs manual review

checks.name: Micro vs macro separation
checks.finding: Conversion action types not verified — need to confirm bookings vs inquiries vs page views

checks.name: Conversion value assignment
checks.finding: No conversion value reported — tour booking values should be tracked for ROAS optimization

checks.name: Search term audit recency
checks.finding: Exact match campaign limits waste but search terms should still be reviewed for close variant leakage

checks.name: Negative keyword lists exist
checks.finding: Not verified — exact match provides some protection but negatives still needed for close variants

checks.name: Campaign count per objective
checks.finding: Only 1 campaign — very limited. No brand protection, no PMax, no expansion campaigns

checks.name: Brand vs Non-Brand separation
checks.finding: No brand campaign. Single exact match campaign likely mixes brand and non-brand

checks.name: PMax present for eligible accounts
checks.finding: No PMax campaign — tourism is highly visual and well-suited for PMax with video/image assets

checks.name: Budget allocation matches priority
checks.finding: All eggs in one basket — single campaign failure means zero visibility

checks.name: Search CTR performance
checks.finding: 8.89% CTR is excellent — indicates strong keyword-to-ad relevance

checks.name: Keyword match types
checks.finding: Exact match only — very controlled but may be missing high-intent variations

checks.name: Keyword expansion opportunity
checks.finding: Only exact match in 1 campaign — significant opportunity to expand with phrase/broad match + smart bidding

checks.name: CTR vs industry benchmark
checks.finding: 8.89% CTR vs ~4-6% travel benchmark — well above average

checks.name: Ad freshness
checks.finding: Ad creative testing not verified — single campaign may have limited ad rotation

checks.name: Smart bidding strategy active
checks.finding: Bidding strategy not verified from available data

checks.name: Geographic targeting accuracy
checks.finding: Tourism targeting should include key source markets (US, Canada, Europe) — verify location settings

checks.name: Customer Match lists
checks.finding: No Customer Match or remarketing audiences visible — past tourists are high-value retargeting prospects

quickWins.action: Add conversion value tracking — assign tour booking values to enable ROAS-based bidding
Launch a brand Search campaign to protect brand terms from competitor bidding
Add phrase match and broad match variations of top-performing exact keywords in a new campaign
Upload customer email list for Customer Match remarketing
Verify conversion tracking — ensure bookings are the only Primary conversion action

items: Verify and clean conversion tracking — ensure only bookings/qualified inquiries are Primary
Add dynamic conversion values for tour bookings
Review and expand negative keywords even with exact match (close variants)
Launch phrase match campaign for high-intent tour queries
Launch PMax campaign with Costa Rica waterfall imagery and video assets
Test broad match + Max Conversions for keyword discovery
Build remarketing audiences from site visitors and past bookers
Test Demand Gen for upper-funnel tourism discovery (YouTube, Discover)
Expand geographic targeting to additional source markets
Seasonal bid adjustments for peak Costa Rica tourism season
Test competitor targeting for other Costa Rica tour operators
